QuestData.Title: Rampaging Rodents
QuestData.Description: I went off this morning to watch my papa fight the virmen. When I came back, the farm was full of marmots!$b$bI don't want to kill them, but we need to get rid of them. Hey, I know! We can close the holes!$b$bFill in their holes with dirt, so they can't come out in our farm anymore.
QuestData.LogDescription: Move 6 Plump Marmots off of Thunderfoot Farm, and fill in 6 Marmot Holes.
QuestData.CompletionText: The marmots won't be happy when you try to fill in their holes.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $gsir:ma'am;! Now I can get back to my chores.
